resources.string: Hello, my friend!\n My name is Tasker, i will be helping you, on your way to success
Important and urgent tasks, requiring your intervention. Solve them as quickly as possible and try to avoid their occurrence.
Important and not urgent tasks, do them as soon as they appear. Try to focus on this section, do not allow theme to become ugren ones.
Not important, but urgent tasks, this kind of task can be solved sombody else. As a rule, these problems realize anotherâ€™s goals. Try to dielegate theme.
Not important and not urgent tasks. Little things stealing your time. Do these things in the last turn, or do not do at all.
Quality is not an act, it\'s a habbit
